For 16.04 and above.
sudo snap install solc


To create bin and abi file
solc DappToken.sol --allow-paths "." --bin --abi --optimize -o .

solcjs DappToken.sol --bin
solcjs DappToken.sol --abi


var dappContract = var simpletoken = simpletokenContract.new(
   {
     from: '0x614b65584331c6856546bdb7486d992ee7cbb99e',
     data: "",
     gas: '4700000'
   }, function (e, contract){
    console.log(e, contract);
    if (typeof contract.address !== 'undefined') {
         console.log('Contract mined! address: ' + contract.address + ' transactionHash: ' + contract.transactionHash);
    }
 })

> var bytecode = '0x<CONTENTS_OF_BIN_FILE>'

var myContract = new web3.eth.Contract(myabi, '0x614b65584331c6856546bdb7486d992ee7cbb99e',{from:'0x614b65584331c6856546bdb7486d992ee7cbb99e', gasPrice: '20000000000'});


var myContract = new web3.eth.Contract(contractAbi, {from:'0x614b65584331c6856546bdb7486d992ee7cbb99e', data: contractHex, gasPrice: '20000000000'});

web3.eth.Iban.fromAddress("0x614b65584331c6856546bdb7486d992ee7cbb99e");

web3.eth.Iban.toAddress('XE57BD55E2PR0THO0USXQVT4MU112Y0HNKU')


myContract.deploy({
    arguments: [1000000]
}).send({
    from: '0x614b65584331c6856546bdb7486d992ee7cbb99e',
    gas: 1500000,
    gasPrice: '30000000000000'
}, function(error, transactionHash){  })
.on('error', function(error){  })
.on('transactionHash', function(transactionHash){  })
.on('receipt', function(receipt){
   console.log(receipt.contractAddress)
}).on('confirmation', function(confirmationNumber, receipt){ })
.then(function(newContractInstance){
    console.log(newContractInstance.options.address);
});
